backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic with types and storage maps for hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, profiles, and invite tokens, including hardcoded admin and access-control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a targeted regression verification pass and its related files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists auto‑generated summaries of numerous frontend source files including routing, hooks, pages, components, and build metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with consistent UI theming tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, favicon, and bootstrapping the frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Pre‑release regression checklist covering authentication, booking flows, hotel management, payments, and HOTEL DUMMY purge verification steps.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes template containing verification checklists for versions V40+, V39, and future releases, focusing on cleanup tasks and key flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, routing, authentication gates, and renders the main app shell with all page routes.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the static build version string.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays an admin table of all bookings with hotel info, status, and booking details handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Provides admin tools to remove legacy room photos and payment methods for a hotel, with input validation and result logs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Allows admins to toggle hotel active status and subscription level using a table interface.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Lets admins generate and manage hotel invite tokens after validating a principal ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access-denied message, explains required roles, and provides navigation or hotel activation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Displays an error screen for permission check failures with retry and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Provides a form to validate and consume hotel invite tokens and triggers activation-related query invalidations and navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Blocks access until the authenticated user completes a basic profile form and saves it via API.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and forces Internet Identity authentication, showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Checks user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation before rendering children or showing denial/error screens.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Shows booking details in a dialog including dates, guests, rooms, status, price, and optional guest principal copying.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating bookings with date validation, price calculation, and success display after API submission.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Displays a badge showing a booking's status with corresponding label and style variant.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Fetches and displays a user's bookings in a table with options to view details and cancel pending bookings.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Shows a dialog containing a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Displays authentication, role, and hotel-profile diagnostic information for debugging access issues.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Lists hotel-specific bookings with controls to confirm or cancel and view booking details.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Manages a hotel's payment methods, allowing adding and removing entries.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Allows hotel owners to view and update their hotel profile and contact information.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Placeholder panel noting that stay-recording functionality is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with fallback handling, showing thumbnails and a main image in compact or full layout, and tracks failed image loads.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Provides UI for creating and editing hotel rooms, including form handling, image upload, and displaying room photos.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows the hotel's subscription status with badges and alerts, and provides admin contact instructions when inactive.
Wraps the app layout with top navigation, main content area, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Offers a simple language dropdown allowing selection of English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with links, login/logout, admin and hotel area access, and language selection based on user state.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact information and payment methods for hotel activation and subscription only.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays hotel payment methods and contact options, rendering cards for methods and buttons for WhatsApp or email if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, handling login/logout, and exposing status through React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user roles, profiles, hotel activation status, and invite token actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles room image uploads by converting files to data URLs and tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Implements a locale context with persistence in localStorage, allowing components to read and update the active locale.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with consistent color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays the user's authentication, role, and hotel access status with tools to validate and consume invite tokens and refresh account data.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with sections for managing invite tokens, hotel visibility, bookings, and system cleanup.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Lists all active hotels with thumbnails and allows users to preview photos and navigate to hotel details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Provides guests with quick access to their bookings and account status, plus a table of all their reservations.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Main management interface for hotel owners, offering tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed hotel information, room listings, photos, payment methods, and booking options for a selected hotel.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Landing menu that directs users to guest or hotel portals based on authentication, admin status, and hotel activation.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: React page showing user bookings with actions to browse hotels and view account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums matching backend types and the ExtendedBackendInterface API surface.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility to enable debug mode based on environment or URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Currency helpers for formatting amounts and validating supported currencies.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking room picture URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, backend issues, and architectural notes for fixing booking, hotel, and data cleanup flows.
